doc:
Adam Anouer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adam_Anouer 0 Adam Anouer (Born 3 April 1990) is an English actor best known for his work on screen. Adam was born in Hammersmith, West London, and studied acting in Hammersmith and West London College. He attained his debut theatrical role at the Lyric Hammersmith annual Christmas pantomime Aladdin in 2011. He later participated in a viral campaign for the Heart4More foundation headed by Tobi Alabi and produced by ITV's Fixers to raise medical awareness of heart defects such as HCM in professional sports. He later made his Television debut in 50 Ways to Kill Your Lover playing the role of Lance Hacking. Adam_Anouer ( Born 3_April_1990 ) is an_English_actor best_known for his_work on screen . Adam was_born in Hammersmith , West_London , and studied_acting in Hammersmith and West_London_College . He attained his_debut_theatrical_role at the_Lyric_Hammersmith_annual_Christmas_pantomime_Aladdin in 2011 . He later participated in a_viral_campaign for the_Heart4More_foundation headed by Tobi_Alabi and produced by ITV 's_Fixers to_raise medical_awareness of heart_defects such_as HCM in professional_sports . He later made his_Television_debut in 50_Ways to_Kill Your_Lover playing the_role of Lance_Hacking .
